long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
KRUL's mission is to improve and enhance the ethics of lead generation methods on LinkedIn through careful and thoughtful automation. No spamming, better quality, more precise targeting.

IMPORTANT: KRUL extension is should be used together with krul.app service. Visit krul.app and create a free account.
